summary:
My first skyrim mod. First release, to be optimized and improved.
A unique variant of General Tulius\' armor.
descriptionHtml:
My first skyrim mod, a throwback to my all time favourite armor of Diablo 2. I\'ve been attempting a retexture but I think it will take me far too long to figure out how to do it with 0 experience.

1: Installation/Update
   - Download the mod navigate to your data folder(c:/programfiles(x86)/steam/steamapps/ common/skyrim/data) drag and drop the esp. Activate the ESP by checking the box under datafiles of the launcher (if it doesnt show up in there u may have done something wrong). If you are updating to a new version, do the same, but select copy and replace when the dialogue box shows up.

2: Location:
 - The armor is found in a player owned novice locked chest inside the Drunken Huntsman. (it is a player chest as well so you should be able to use it as storage before you get breezehome).

3: Description
 - The armor has a custom enchantment : Fortify shouts 15%, Poison cloud sneak effect (boethia, 15), resist magic 25%, resist dmg(25%),Lover\'s comfort : health 25 (intended to be the 25% increase in skill gain) i am still working out the kinks and i havent done much testing of the armor yet. I am planning on testing it out tonight to see if it works as i intended.

I am looking for someone to make me a custom texture similar to the Silks of the Victor from diablo 2(activision-blizzard) I would like the blank/formed part of the chest to feature a silver werewolfesque head with gold accents and glowing (if possible) Gemstones for eyes, with crimson/(dark/blood red) accents on the armor (spray paint tool, like splattered blood collecting in the formed chest) Also my last request for the retexture would require some collaboration because i would like a glowing inscription on the armor in daedric or the dragon tongue that says \"Woven from the hair of the Defeated\" This is beyond me currently and i suck too badly to figure it out it seems.
author: LtAscott

files.name: Silksofthevictor
files.changelogHtml: Added sword; soul snare, crit effect on death : Dark ritual power(15% chance) absorb health 25 points, paralyze 3 seconds, soul trap 5 seconds.
